name: Slug Jumper
description:
Slug Boy is your average slug, living in the slug town of Slugville. But deep down, Slug Boy feels incomplete. There has to be more to life than being just a normal slug, right? So off he goes, jumping through his garden home to find the true meaning of what it takes to be a slug. 

Slug Jumper is a 2D pixel platformer designed by Slug Station Studios. The game features original art, music, and a custom momentum system, along with a list of other features.

Stick: Stick to walls, stems, and platforms to ascend over obstacles and climb in the garden. 

Bounce: Build up momentum and bounce off surfaces to clear obstacles and enemies that stand between Slug Boy and his future shell.

Danger: The garden is filled with many dangers that seek to stop Slug Boy from finding his dream shell. Salty spikes and enemies will stop at nothing to salt our poor slug.

Bosses: Outrun large bosses while making your way through levels designed to test your skills.

This game is in it's early stages. Our content is limited at the moment, but Slug Station Studios is committed to this game and plan to release more content in the future.
